unixdir = str(ds.$(name)_outputdirectory).replace("\\","/") startfileindex = str(commonblock["$(name)_fileindex"] - 1) if len(unixdir)> 1 and unixdir[1] == ":": unixdir = "/data" + unixdir[2:] if unixdir and unixdir[-1] == "/": unixdir = unixdir[:-1] ds.result = "" + unixdir + "/" + ds.$(name)_filepattern + "-%05d." ds.result += str(ds.$(name)_filename.split(".")[-1]) ds.result += ":" + startfileindex + ":" + str(ds.$(name)_fileindex - 1)
